column2: "Afei ɔbaa dɛ bosoom a otsia esuon no mu
column3: Elisama ba Netania ne ba Ismael
column5: na ɔhen n’etsitsir no mu no
column6: na mbarimba du a wɔka no ho no
column7: baa Ahikam ba Gedalia nkyɛn wɔ Mizpa: na Mizpa hɔ na wɔbɔɔ mu dzidzii."

column3: na mbarimba du a wɔka no ho no soɛree
column4: na wɔdze afona twitwaa Safan ba Ahikam ne ba Gedalia
column5: na wokum nyia Babilɔnhen hyɛɛ no ambrado wɔ asaase no do no."

column2: "Ismael so kunkum Jewfo a wɔnye Gedalia wɔ Mizpa nyina
column3: na Kaldeafo a wohun hɔn wɔ hɔ no

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ oeku Gedalia ekyir ndaenu no a obiara nntsee no
column6: na Samaria bae a woeyiyi hɔn abɔdwesa na woesunsuan hɔn ntar mu
column8: na edziban afɔr na nduhuam kitsakitsa hɔn nsamu

column2: "Na Netania ba Ismael fiir edzi fii Mizpa kehyiaa hɔn kwan
column3: ɔrokɔ nyina nna orusu: na ɔbaa dɛ
column6: Hom mbra Ahikam ba Gedalia nkyɛn."

column3: wɔbaa kurow no ne finimfin no
column5: ɔnoara na mbarimba a wɔka no ho no kunkum hɔn
column6: na wɔtoow hɔn guu mona no mu."

column2: "Na hɔn mu mbarimba du see dɛ
column3: Mma nnku hɛn: na yɛwɔ edzidzidze suma haban mu
column7: na oennku hɔn ammfora hɔn nuanom no."

column2: "Afei mona a Ismael toow hɔn a okunkum hɔn kaa Gedalia ho hɔn efun guu mu no
column3: (ɔnoara nye dza ɔhen Asa tui wɔ Israelhen Baasha ho suro ntsi no) na Netania ba Ismael dze hɔn a wokunkum hɔn no hɔn efun hyɛɛ no ma."

column2: "Nna Ismael faa ɔman nkaa a wɔwɔ Mizpa no nyinara kɔr ndɔmmum
column4: na nkorɔfo a wɔkaa Mizpa aweɔmfo safohen Nebuzaradan dze hyɛɛ Ahikam ba Gedalia n’ase no nyina Netania ba Ismael soaa hɔn ndɔmmum kɔree
column5: na osii mu dɛ orukotwa mu akɔ Ammonmba no nkyɛn."

column3: na dɔm asafohemfo a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn no nyina
column4: wɔtsee mbusu nyina a Netania ba Ismael abɔ no
column7: na wɔkɔr dɛ wɔnye Netania ba Ismael rokɔko
column8: na wɔkɔtoo no wɔ esu kɛse a ɔwɔ Gibeon no ho."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nkorɔfo nyina a wɔwɔ Ismael nkyɛn no hun Karea ba Johanan
column3: na dɔm asafohemfo nyina a wɔka no ho no

column2: "Nna nkorɔfo a Ismael soaa hɔn ndɔmmum fii Mizpa kɔree no
column5: na wɔkɔr Karea ba Johanan nkyɛn."

column2: "Na Netania ba Ismael nye mbarimba baawɔtwe fii Karea nsa kɔr Ammonmba no nkyɛn."
"Nna Karea ba Johanan na dɔm no mu asafohemfo no nyina faa ɔman no nkaa no nyina a ɔkɛgyee hɔn fii Netania ba Ismael a okum Ahikam ba Gedalia wɔ Mizpa no nsamu no: mbarimba akofo
column5: na epiafo a ɔdze hɔn fi Gideon sanee bae no:"

column3: na wɔkɛtsenaa Gerut Kimham a ɔwɔ Bɛtlɛhɛm no
column6: "wɔ Kaldeafo no ntsi: osiandɛ wosuroo hɔn
column7: wɔ dɛ Netania ba Ismael eku Ahikam ba Gedalia a Babilɔnhen hyɛɛ no ambrado wɔ asaase no do ntsi."
